column4: is there any application to export windows from my ubuntu box to my windows box over the network ?
windows copy protection would kick in and it would not work
It is not a problem if you are not giving shell access to untrusted people
think about people selling webspace or shell accounts...
I am sure the patch will be out quickly ... they are working on it.. but for 99% of the users, it is not an issue.
1% of all ubuntu users is a freaking huge lot, i think you are overestimating it now, but still it is an issue for alot of people
this is not the discussion room, there is no fix yet, if you care to discuss it.. take it to offtopic
try cd to folder.. and make uninstall
no rule to make target uninstall
any other idea how to remove something installed with make ?
and after gparted created the partition it shows that much used? or that much or your total tb is not available
gparted shows 7.53gb used, but when i rightklick it in /media it shows the real size gparted gave me too, and that 46gb are used

Please copy and paste this into a term  sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && cp /etc/fstab ~/Desktop/Partition_Layout.txt && sudo fdisk -l >> ~/Desktop/Partition_Layout.txt && cat /home/$USER/Desktop/Partition_Layout.txt | pastebinit  (Provide Pastebin link in channel)
I am still a bit sleepy so pardon my asking again.. but which partition are we talking about
